name: NSPointerFunctions
desc: An instance of NSPointerFunctions defines callout functions appropriate for managing a pointer reference held somewhere else.

items.name: init(options: NSPointerFunctions.Options)
items.desc: Returns an NSPointerFunctions object initialized with the given options.

items.name: var isEqualFunction: ((UnsafeRawPointer, UnsafeRawPointer, ((UnsafeRawPointer) -> Int)?) -> ObjCBool)?
items.desc: The function used to compare pointers.

items.name: var sizeFunction: ((UnsafeRawPointer) -> Int)?
items.desc: The function used to determine the size of pointers.

items.name: var descriptionFunction: ((UnsafeRawPointer) -> String?)?
items.desc: The function used to describe elements.

items.name: var acquireFunction: ((UnsafeRawPointer, ((UnsafeRawPointer) -> Int)?, ObjCBool) -> UnsafeMutableRawPointer)?
items.desc: The function used to acquire memory.

items.name: var relinquishFunction: ((UnsafeRawPointer, ((UnsafeRawPointer) -> Int)?) -> Void)?
items.desc: The function used to relinquish memory.

items.name: struct NSPointerFunctions.Options
items.desc: Defines the memory and personality options for an NSPointerFunctions object.
